author: bsunanda
body: Modify the AlCa codes, Calibration tree makers and the test scripts. Also changes the offline DQM for the isotrack trigger monitor. Tested in 7_5_X, seen to give clean test on top of 7_4_2.
title: bsunanda:Run2-alca15 Backport the changes for AlCaReco and Trigger codes for Hcal calibrations in PRs 8943, 8950 and 9062
